sentences.en: And so, to answer your question, that's why your mother is disappointed.
sentences.cn: 现在可以回答你的问题了，你母亲失望的原因就在这里。

sentences.en: Castle-hunters won't be disappointed with the Isle of Man.
sentences.cn: 马恩岛不会让城堡探寻者失望的。

sentences.en: Dad seemed more disappointed than angry.
sentences.cn: 与其说爸爸生气，倒不如说他失望。

sentences.en: He felt disappointed but he tried to put on a brave face.
sentences.cn: 他感到很失望，但还竭力强装欢笑。

sentences.en: He informed us with massive understatement that he was feeling disappointed.
sentences.cn: 他极力轻描淡写地跟我们说他感到失望。

sentences.en: He was disappointed and saddened that legal argument had stopped the trial.
sentences.cn: 法律论证迫使审理中止，这让他既失望又悲伤。

sentences.en: I was disappointed whenever the cook found fault with my work.
sentences.cn: 每当厨师挑剔我干的活儿时，我都非常沮丧。

sentences.en: Instead of being disappointed at where you are, think optimistically about where you are going.
sentences.cn: 与其对你现在所处的位置感到失望，不如乐观地想想你前进的方向。

sentences.en: She went away disappointed after getting tantalisingly close to breaking the record.
sentences.cn: 眼看就要破纪录却功亏一篑，她只能失望地离开。

sentences.en: She will be disappointed if her feelings are not returned.
sentences.cn: 如果她的感情得不到回报，她会感到非常失望。

sentences.en: They've been rejected, disappointed, ignored, passed over.
sentences.cn: 他们遭到拒绝，满心失望，备受冷落，无人理会。

sentences.en: To say we are disappointed about this is putting it mildly.
sentences.cn: 说我们对此很失望是很客气的说法。

sentences.en: When things go wrong, all of us naturally feel disappointed and frustrated.
sentences.cn: 出问题时，我们大家自然都感到失望和沮丧。

sentences.en: You should have accepted that. I'm disappointed in you.
sentences.cn: 你本应该接受那个的，我对你很失望。

words.tran_cn: 令人失望的；令人扫兴的
令人失望（disappoint的ing形式）；辜负…的期望

trans.tran_en: unhappy because something you hoped for did not happen, or because someone or something was not as good as you expected
